LIST_JOB.title: UX/UI Designer (Fre/Jun)
LIST_JOB.description: Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, or similar.
jobDescription: Create wireframes, user flows, and prototypes to visualize and communicate design ideas.
Iterate on designs based on feedback and user testing results.
Develop visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications.
Collaborate with the development team to ensure design feasibility and consistency.
Create and maintain design system for products.
Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders, participate in design reviews and iterate based on feedback from team members.
skills: Up to 2 years of professional experience in UX/UI design.
Good communication in English.
Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, or similar.
Knowledge of design systems and their implementation.
Basic understanding of front-end development technologies (HTML, CSS, etc.).
Portfolio showcasing design projects and problem-solving skills.
Communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to receive and incorporate feedback to improve designs.
Familiarity with user interface guidelines for various platforms (iOS, Android).
Experience with motion design and/or micro-interactions is a plus.

LIST_JOB.title: UX/UI Designer (Mid/Sen)
LIST_JOB.description: Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, or similar.
jobDescription: Create wireframes, user flows, and prototypes to visualize and communicate design ideas.
Iterate on designs based on feedback and user testing results.
Develop visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications.
Collaborate with the development team to ensure design feasibility and consistency.
Create and maintain design system for products.
Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders, participate in design reviews and iterate based on feedback from team members.
skills: Up to 5 years of professional experience in UX/UI design.
Excellent communication in English.
Advanced proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, or similar.
Deep understanding of design systems and their implementation.
Strong grasp of front-end development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, etc.).

Strong communication and collaboration skills, including experience working in cross-functional teams.
Proven ability to lead design projects from concept to completion, incorporating feedback effectively.
Expertise in user interface guidelines for various platforms (iOS, Android).
Experience in motion design and/or micro-interactions.

LIST_JOB.title: FrontEnd Developer (Mid/Sen)
LIST_JOB.description: Proficient in at least one and has experience with different frontend frameworks: Angular, React, Vue.
jobDescription: Build responsive and interactive websites, working closely with our team and our clients.
Follow best practices and coding standards to ensure we have clean codes.
Respond to client inquiries and requests on time.
Work as part of a team to meet the demanding project requirements.
Work in a multidisciplinary team with other professionals such as back-end developers, web designers, and Professional Foreign Developers.
Work with your team to deliver projects with high efficiency, including giving direction to the team and decision-making on the project.
Support, and advise to solve hard issues in the whole company.
skills: Demonstrate problem-solving skills.
An eagerness to learn and apply new technology.
Confidence in HTML and CSS development. HTML5/CSS3 and SASS/LESS are a bonus.
Deep understanding of JavaScript development (prefer ES6) and TypeScript.
Experience writing high-performance, reusable code for UI components.
Fluent in at least one and has Experience with different frontend frameworks: Angular, React, Vue.
Strong understanding of Git.
A good understanding of algorithms and data structures. Proficient in logical thinking.
Solid experience with modern build tools (Webpack, Docker, CICD,â€¦).
Good command of English.

LIST_JOB.title: NodeJS Developer (Mid/Sen)
LIST_JOB.description: Proficient in building enterprise applications using JavaScript stacks and SQL/NoSQL databases.
jobDescription: Proficient in building enterprise applications using JavaScript stacks and SQL/NoSQL databases.
Developing scalable and secure backend services.
Integration with frontend technologies and APIs.
Database management and optimization.
Testing and debugging applications.
skills: Experience in Node.js and JavaScript frameworks like Express.js.
Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB).
Ability to design and implement scalable backend services.
Understanding of RESTful API design principles.
Experience in unit testing and debugging techniques.
Knowledge of security best practices in web development.

LIST_JOB.title: React Native Developer
LIST_JOB.description: Have experienced with at least one of the following Redux, Rudux Saga, Redux Thunk
jobDescription: Experience with Redux, Redux Saga, or Redux Thunk for state management.
Building cross-platform mobile applications using React Native.
Integration with native modules and third-party libraries.
Version control and collaboration using Git.
Understanding of mobile performance optimization.
skills: Proficiency in React Native framework.
Knowledge of Redux or other state management libraries.
Ability to develop and deploy cross-platform mobile applications.
Experience with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming.
Version control and code collaboration using Git.
Problem-solving skills in mobile application development.

LIST_JOB.title: IT Support
LIST_JOB.description: Graduated from College/University in IT field.
jobDescription: Providing technical support and troubleshooting for IT-related issues.
Installing and configuring hardware and software.
Network management and system monitoring.
User training and documentation.
Maintaining IT inventory and asset management.
skills: Knowledge in hardware and software troubleshooting.
Understanding of network protocols and services.
Ability to install and configure computer systems.
Effective communication and customer service skills.
Documentation and reporting skills.
Ability to prioritize and manage tasks efficiently.

LIST_JOB.title: Sale IT (US/UK/Japan Market)
LIST_JOB.description: Having at least 2 years of experience in Sales IT.
jobDescription: Managing and developing client accounts in US/UK/Japan markets.
Understanding client needs and proposing suitable IT solutions.
Negotiating contracts and closing sales deals.
Market research and competitor analysis.
Providing post-sales support and customer service.
skills: Proven experience in IT sales, preferably in US/UK/Japan markets.
Strong negotiation and sales closing skills.
Understanding of IT solutions and services.
Market analysis and client relationship management.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
